column4: i have a problem with my graphic card drivers: there seems to be a problem with the nvidia 71... drivers so i have to isntall them manually (thats written in many forums) I downloaded them and launched the installation after shutting down the X server
but i get this error
no kernel interface was found
and it tries to download
kernel interface from nvidia ftp site but
at the end
i get this error
unable to build the NVIDIA kernel module
please help :S
use the repositories luke
what is this ?
just use System -> Administration -> Hardware Drivers to install nvidia drivers
i tried this
so what happened when you tried Hardware Drivers?
well ... as far as i know there is a problem with this very same video card - the drivers should be installed manually
what card?  And how do you know this?
geforce2 mx/mx 400 and i know this because ive been reading forums since yesterday :S
what version of ubuntu?
is your card mentioned in the release notes?
hmmm i dont know
Thanks alot : my video card seems to be too old and the drivers that 8.10 provides do not support 3d .... But there is something else i would like to ask you
you need to give the exact error
